title: Group Therapy: She Doesn't Want to Feed the Cats
description: A listener is in a predicament involving cats.  She bought a house and the previous owner mentioned that a few stray cats would come by everyday and she would feed them.  So the old owner asked her to keep feeding them and she would provide the food.  The problem, the new owner doesn't like cats and tries to avoid it but now the old owner is coming around to see if she's been doing it.  What should she do?
